arStrings.szText: After spending {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} Fury within {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, your next cast of {c_important}Hammer of the Ancients{/c}, {c_important}Upheaval{/c}, or {c_important}Death Blow{/c} is a guaranteed Critical Strike and deals {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} bonus Critical Strike Damage.
